short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the font of all websites to the OpenDyslexic font with a toggle. Helps dyslexic people with reading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the font of all websites to the OpenDyslexic font with a toggle. Helps dyslexic people with reading, as the font is proven to help people with Dyslexia to read words better.
